message.msgid: Are you sure to connect to this AP?
message.msgstr: Are you sure to connect to this AP?

message.msgid: SSID can only consist of numbers,letters,underline and colon.
message.msgstr: SSID can only consist of numbers,letters,underline and colon!

message.msgid: Please enter a unicast MAC address
message.msgstr: Please enter a unicast MAC address!

message.msgid: Please enter the correct MAC address
message.msgstr: Please enter the correct MAC address!
You only need to set the wireless basic information on this page, we suggest you set only the SSID and channel and keep the other items the default.
The network name shared by all the devices in the wireless network.

SSID Broadcast: When wireless clients search for the wireless networks to connect in the area ,they detect SSID broadcast via the router, if selected ,the router will broadcast its SSID to all wireless hosts!
Channel:You can select Auto-select mode, or any of the channel list,try to select the less used channels in your area to avoid interference.
Extension Channel:To confirm the network’s frequency range in 11n mode.
Wired WAN mode: In this mode the router access to the Internet via the Wired WAN port.
Wireless WAN mode: In this mode, the router wirelessly access to the Internet. This method requires you to set the SSID, Channel and security mode as that are provided by your ISP.

message.msgid: Warning: Can not create XMLHTTP example
message.msgstr: Warning: Can not create XMLHTTP example!

message.msgid: Warning:Key renewal interval is too short,range
message.msgstr: Warning:Key renewal interval is too short,range

message.msgid: Please enter a valid key renewal interval
message.msgstr: Please enter a valid key renewal interval!

message.msgid: This function can only be used after the wireless function is enabled
message.msgstr: This function can only be used after the wireless function is enabled!

802.11n standard only defines Open-None（Disable）,WPA personal-AES, and WPA2 personal-AES encryption methods. Other encryption methods are non-standard, and compatibility problems may occur among different manufacturers.
Our company has optimized wireless encryption. Select WPA-AES and you can prevent others from access to your network.

You can enable personal or mixed mode, but you should make sure that your wireless client support this encryption method. When you are not familiar with the security modes, we suggest using WPA-personal. If you know well about these security modes, you can select any one as long as your wireless client also support it.
Once "permit only" is chosen, you must enter one rule!

message.msgid: Please enter a unicast MAC address
message.msgstr: Please enter a unicast MAC address!
By using the wireless access control function, you can control one PC’s communication with one router according to the MAC address of the PC’s wireless adapter.

message.msgid: This page displays the connection information of the wireless router
message.msgstr: This page displays the connection information of the wireless router.
On this page,you can view the information of the connected wireless clients.
MAC Address:the wireless MAC bandwidth of the current host:channel frequency width.

message.msgid: the length is not within the range
message.msgstr: the length is not within the range!

message.msgid: Reboot the router to bring the settings into effect ,reboot now
message.msgstr: Reboot the router to bring the settings into effect ,reboot now?

message.msgid: Reboot wireless module to bring the settings into effect ,reboot now
message.msgstr: Reboot wireless module to bring the settings into effect ,reboot now?

message.msgid: remarks can only consist of numbers ,letters and underlines
message.msgstr: remarks can only consist of numbers ,letters and underlines!

message.msgid: The MAC address belongs to reserved addresses, please re-enter
message.msgstr: The MAC address belongs to reserved addresses, please re-enter!

message.msgid: The MAC address belongs to multicast addresses, please re-enter
message.msgstr: The MAC address belongs to multicast addresses, please re-enter!
